The number of rifles surrendered has hardly been increased, and remains quite inadequate.-Destruction continues., but the column "Total Destroyed" contains a large proportion of wa., material which the Germans olain to have destroyed prior to control being instituted, this is subject to further investigation by the Commission of Control.x Details of German Guns and barrels surrendered to Commission cf Control by 2?th May,, 1920.Field Guns and Howitzers.
